mapper.insert:
select EMP_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into EMP values(#{empNo}, #{empName}, #{empPwd}, #{empTel}, #{empEmail}, #{empZipcode}, #{empAddress}, #{empAddressdetail}, to_date('#{empRegdate}','YYYY-MM-DD'), null, #{empPhoto}, #{empSalary},#{empAccount}, #{empAdminLev}, to_date('#{empBirth}','YYYY-DD-MM'), #{departmentNo}, #{positionNo})
